extDescription.message: Clear cookies and various types of cache when the browser starts up.

ih_extTitle_l1.description: First line of the text logo [options.html]

ih_extTitle_l2.description: First line of the text logo [options.html]

ih_noteCookiesReq.description: Header of the Cookie tip box in tab mode (hidden in popup mode) [options.html]

ih_noteCookiesDesc.message: Cookies are small data files stored by websites on your browser to remember your preferences, login status, and track browsing activity.
ih_noteCookiesDesc.description: Description of the Cookie tip box in tab mode (hidden in popup mode) [options.html]

ih_noteCacheReq.description: Header of the Cache tip box in tab mode (hidden in popup mode) [options.html]

ih_noteCacheDesc.message: Cache is temporary storage of web page resources (like images, scripts, etc.) to speed up page load times during future visits.
ih_noteCacheDesc.description: Description of the Cache tip box in tab mode (hidden in popup mode) [options.html]

ih_noteLocalStorageReq.description: Header of the LocalStorage tip box in tab mode (hidden in popup mode) [options.html]

ih_noteLocalStorageDesc.message: LocalStorage is persistent storage mechanism for storing small amounts of data (key-value pairs) locally in the browser, accessible by the website even after the browser is closed.
ih_noteLocalStorageDesc.description: Description of the LocalStorage tip box in tab mode (hidden in popup mode) [options.html]

ih_noteWebSQLReq.description: Header of the WebSQL tip box in tab mode (hidden in popup mode) [options.html]

ih_noteWebSQLDesc.message: WebSQL is a deprecated browser-based database storage mechanism, allowing structured data to be stored in SQL-based databases.
ih_noteWebSQLDesc.description: Description of the WebSQL tip box in tab mode (hidden in popup mode) [options.html]

ih_noteFileSystemsReq.description: Header of the FileSystems tip box in tab mode (hidden in popup mode) [options.html]

ih_noteFileSystemsDesc.message: FilesSystems allows websites to store files and data on your computer's filesystem, enabling larger and more complex data storage.
ih_noteFileSystemsDesc.description: Description of the FileSystems tip box in tab mode (hidden in popup mode) [options.html]

ih_noteIndexedDBReq.description: Header of the IndexedDB tip box in tab mode (hidden in popup mode) [options.html]

ih_noteIndexedDBDesc.message: indexedDB low-level API for storing large amounts of structured data, including files and blobs, allowing for offline capabilities.
ih_noteIndexedDBDesc.description: Description of the IndexedDB tip box in tab mode (hidden in popup mode) [options.html]

ih_noteServiceWorkersReq.description: Header of the ServiceWorkers tip box in tab mode (hidden in popup mode) [options.html]

ih_noteServiceWorkersDesc.message: ServiceWorkers are scripts running in the background of your browser, enabling features like offline access, background sync, and push notifications.
ih_noteServiceWorkersDesc.description: Description of the ServiceWorkers tip box in tab mode (hidden in popup mode) [options.html]

ih_noteCacheStorageReq.description: Header of the CacheStorage tip box in tab mode (hidden in popup mode) [options.html]

ih_noteCacheStorageDesc.message: CacheStorage is a storage mechanism used by ServiceWorkers to cache network requests and responses for offline access and faster load times.
ih_noteCacheStorageDesc.description: Description of the CacheStorage tip box in tab mode (hidden in popup mode) [options.html]

ih_noteDomainMain.message: ▪ The main domain name (e.g. google.com instead of account.google.com or www.google.com)
ih_noteDomainMain.description: Tip box line for browsing data requiring main domains only [options.html]

ih_noteDomainSub.message: ▪ The exact subdomains of the targeted pages (e.g. account.google.com)
ih_noteDomainSub.description: Tip box line for browsing data requiring also sub domains [options.html]

ih_noteProtocolsRem.message: ▪ The removal of the http:// or https:// protocols

ih_btnExport.description: Value of the button's label to export the extension configuration [options.html]

ih_btnImport.description: Value of the button's label to import the extension configuration [options.html]

sz_promptConfirm.message: Are you sure to clean not whitelisted %TYPE%?
sz_promptConfirm.description: Confirmation request text in the modal window (e.g. Are you sure to clean not whitelisted Cookies?) [options.html]

sz_notifyCleared.message: Not whitelisted %TYPE% have been successfuly cleared.
sz_notifyCleared.description: Browser notification when a browsing data type has been cleared [options.html]
